name: places/ChIJp96x6vtYwokRvtvXROZkm4I
adrFormatAddress: 645 5th Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: High-end retail chain selling luxury Swiss watches & accessories.

originalText.text: I went twice and gave up buying due to the terrible service. The first time I wasn't sure of the size and the salesperson was rude saying “come back when you're sure”. After I understood the size, I went back to the store and the service was much worse. I was served by another salesperson who spoke so loudly that it sounded like an argument. He was agressive and persuasive to the point of making us uncomfortable. He didn't even invite us to sit down and look at the models calmly. I was asking myself “why am I still here?” It was extremely inelegant, it felt like he was doing me a favor by selling me a product. I really gave up using this brand. At that moment I understood that I didn't want to be seen using an inelegant and poorly positioned luxury brand. But it was Christmas and all was not lost, with an opposite treatment, full of smiles, champagne and lots of kindness, Breitling made me buy a beautiful Navitimer chronograph for Christmas.

originalText.text: Absolutely terrible experience! The customer service was absolutely horrendous. I cannot in good conscience recommend this store to anyone. It's advisable to seriously reconsider before making a purchase at this establishment. While they treat you exceptionally well during the purchase, the moment any technical issue arises with the product, they will go to great lengths to avoid honoring the warranty.

text.text: Absolutely terrible experience! The customer service was absolutely horrendous. I cannot in good conscience recommend this store to anyone. It's advisable to seriously reconsider before making a purchase at this establishment. While they treat you exceptionally well during the purchase, the moment any technical issue arises with the product, they will go to great lengths to avoid honoring the warranty.

originalText.text: Kevin and the other fella were great. I came in with a Gulf edition watch I purchased 3 months ago with a snapped off watch band holder (the little thing that keeps the watch band against the band).They replaced it on the spot - at no charge! VERY good service and very friendly guys.

text.text: Kevin and the other fella were great. I came in with a Gulf edition watch I purchased 3 months ago with a snapped off watch band holder (the little thing that keeps the watch band against the band).They replaced it on the spot - at no charge! VERY good service and very friendly guys.

originalText.text: I recently had the unfortunate experience of visiting the Tag Heuer store in New York city, and I must say it was one of the most disappointing and frustrating shopping experiences of my life. I had high expectations for a brand like Tag Heuer, but this store shattered them completely. Save yourself the frustration and avoid this store at all costs. I certainly won't be returning, and I strongly recommend that others seek out a more reputable and customer-friendly Tag Heuer retailer.

text.text: I recently had the unfortunate experience of visiting the Tag Heuer store in New York city, and I must say it was one of the most disappointing and frustrating shopping experiences of my life. I had high expectations for a brand like Tag Heuer, but this store shattered them completely. Save yourself the frustration and avoid this store at all costs. I certainly won't be returning, and I strongly recommend that others seek out a more reputable and customer-friendly Tag Heuer retailer.

originalText.text:
HIGHLY RECOMMEND - I wanted to surprise my partner before our upcoming wedding with a TAG Heuer watch, a running wedding tradition in my family, and while on my way to pick it up, I ran into two very big traffic jams from accidents on the road. It was as if the universe didn’t want me to make it to the store, when it was the only time I could pick it up.

I had to shift my plans, and sent my unsuspecting partner to the store under the guise of figuring out his wrist size for a gift in the future. I am incredibly lucky in that I was working with Chris Eustacio, who very specifically deserves all the praise in the world. He went above and beyond in keeping up the surprise, and in the end, helped facilitate this to be everything I could have ever wanted. I am also grateful for Karina, who facilitated early communications and outlined options for me.

Unbeatable customer service, excellent quality - I could not have asked for anything more! Thank you so much for making this an unforgettable, wonderful experience for my partner and me, TAG Heuer. I look forward to coming back to select anniversary watches!
